summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6301 for the improvement of 19th Avenue Southwest from Southwest Othello Street to approximately 110 feet north of Southwest Webster Street and from approximately 75 feet south of Southwest Webster Street to approximately 40 feet north of Southwest Holden Street and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving same.
